title: Portfolio
description: my web developer portfolio! This project presents my work, my skills and allows you to find out more about my background.

title: Don't Forget Me
description: Dont Forget Me is a appointment management solution to handle bookings, alongside a Raspberry Pi sends email or SMS reminders to reducing no-shows.

title: Your Flow
description: Flow is an innovative mobile app designed to help girls manage their periods. It features to track menstrual cycles and receive personalized reminders.
